ajito_kakutou_010_kakutouboss_02:
Not many Trainers can shrug off my Pokémon’s
attacks like that.[VAR 0114(002C)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_01:
The same to you...Eri, was it? Your Pokémon have
clearly spent a lot of time honing their moves.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_02:
But I’m surprised to find the boss herself out here
defending the gates.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_03:
Don’t you trust your grunts enough to put them
on guard duty?[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_kakutouboss_03:
Watch your mouth.\c
I’m here because I don’t want to risk anyone else
getting hurt, that’s all.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_04:
What a benevolent boss. Now, if you want to
get on with our battle, I’m all ready on my side![VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_06:
I started talking to this girl since she looked like
she was with Team Star...[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_07:
then she and her Pokémon came at me without
warning! We were just battling it out.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_00: Riri! I knew you’d be out here![VAR 0114(002C)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_01: Are you OK? You’re not hurt, are you?![VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_kakutouboss_06:
I’m fine, honestly! Now get away from here—it’s
not safe![VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_02:
I’ll take over guarding the base, Riri! You should
get back inside![VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_kakutouboss_07: No. I won’t back down... I can’t![VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_03: Oh, Riri! You need to stop this![VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_kakutouboss_08:
Until the big boss comes back, I have to protect
all of you in the Caph Squad...\c
And everyone else in Team Star, too.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_04:
That’s why you should get back to the base and
rest up—even just for a little bit![VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_kakutouboss_09: As the boss of this squad, I...I just can’t.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_05:
Riri, please! I’m your friend! Listen to what
I’m saying![VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_08:
Hey, that’s no way to sign off! Let me hear a
“hasta la vistar!” from you, nice and loud![VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_09:
I’m your opponent now, you two! Come on—I’ll
take you both down![VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_11:
My Pokémon and I are actually running on empty
after that last battle.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_12:
Sorry to spring this on you, but do you think you
could handle this grunt alone?[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_13:
Come on, don’t be like that! It’s not like you to
hang me out to dry...[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_nelke_14: Thanks. I’ll be cheering you on from the sidelines![VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_10:
I’ll protect Riri with everything I have. You ready
to battle?[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_11:
Just hurry up and leave, then! I’m not budging
an inch from here.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_13:
Even if all I did was buy Riri a bit of time,
that’s fine.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_010_sitappa_16: My job here is done, so I’ll head back inside![VAR 0114(003F)]
